concept_data.title: Conference of Parliamentary Committees for Union Affairs of Parliaments of the European Union

summary: The "Conference of Parliamentary Committees for Union Affairs of Parliaments of the European Union," commonly referred to as COSAC, serves as a vital platform for collaboration among national parliaments within the EU framework. This conference facilitates dialogue on legislative matters and enhances the scrutiny of EU policies, ensuring that the perspectives of member states are integrated into the Union's decision-making processes. COSAC plays a crucial role in fostering interparliamentary cooperation and reinforcing the principle of subsidiarity, thereby contributing to a more democratic and transparent EU governance structure. As a redirect term, COSAC encapsulates the essence of this collaborative initiative among EU parliaments.
